attributes.action: Ban Nigel Farage from going to Brussels and just generally talking!
attributes.additional_details:
We need to immediately stop Farage travelling to Brussels and weakening our relationship further with the EU pre-negotiations. Let's ban him from Brussels. Let's also just ban him from talking in general as he's even starting to annoy the leavers!

Please refer to the following video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MlN9o3g-yuA
attributes.background: Today (Tues, 28th June), Nigel Farage went to Brussels and stood in the EU parliament and made an utter fool of himself and our nation. We may have a country torn in half but I'm sure both the leave and remain can agree that Farage taunting the very people we need to negotiate with is a bad idea!
